name: DODGER
description:
(Downloadable on Windows)

Imagine being a magical circle that can somehow magically move, or rotate obstacles out of your way, as to dodge oncoming death on your path. Put a name that could be thought up in about ten minutes on that idea, make it into a game and then you'd have DODGER!

The goal of the game is to last as long as possible and get the highest score, while dodging 20 different obstacles that will be chosen in a random order!

Latest Update:

  • Added 2 new obstacles
  • Removed executable Windows version of the game
